divs: sighting detailswas driving south on i77 near exit 9a\b and witnessed three glowing orbs (hovering) over the highway. they were formed in a triangular pattern with distance between (separate) them. i noticed a plane flying in the area to so it was definitely at a lower altitude. i merged on exit i kept watching, other cars were slowing down looking at them too. when i came off the exit i parked in a lot to see where they were and only saw one from my view which began to move in a west until out of view.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around January 18th 2013
Summary: Red/orange glowing orbs over I77 near Ft Jackson
